MATCH (p:Person)-[:PERFORMS_VISIT]->(v:Visit)-[:LOCATED_AT]->(pl:Place)-[:PART_OF]->(r:Region)-[:PART_OF]->(c:Country)-[:PART_OF]->(cont:Continent)
WHERE p.healthstatus = 'Sick' AND v.starttime > p.confirmedtime AND v.duration.seconds IS NOT NULL
WITH cont.name AS continent, v.duration.seconds AS visitDuration
RETURN continent, AVG(visitDuration) AS averageVisitDurationInSeconds

value_validation: ✅ All values in Cypher are consistent with the NL question.
